items.title: Information Type
items.description: Contains details about one information type that is stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and those defined in NIST SP 800-60.

uuid.title: Information Type Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier that can be used to reference this information type entry elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistantly used for a given resource across revisions of the document.

title.title: title field
title.description: A human readable name for the information type. This title should be meaningful within the context of the system.

description.title: Information Type Description
description.description: A summary of how this information type is used within the system.

allOf.title: Information Type Identifier
allOf.description: An identifier qualified by the given identification system used, such as NIST SP 800-60.

confidentiality-impact.title: Confidentiality Impact Level
confidentiality-impact.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the unauthorized disclosure of information.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

integrity-impact.title: Integrity Impact Level
integrity-impact.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the unauthorized modification of information.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

availability-impact.title: Availability Impact Level
availability-impact.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the disruption of access to or use of information or the information system.

selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.
